backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor serving as the backend entry point with no implemented functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting the removal of the 'Play Banana Split Now!' button from HomePage.tsx with high confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend files describing the banana-themed game website structure, components, and styling.
frontend/index.css: Base Tailwind CSS configuration with OKLCH color variables for light and dark modes using a neutral grayscale palette.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with 'RedVelvet Productions' title and root div for React mounting.
frontend/src/App.tsx: TanStack Router setup with root layout (Header/Footer), home route, and privacy policy route.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component displaying copyright for RedVelvet Productions, animated heart icon, and caffeine.ai attribution link.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Sticky header with 'Banana Split' branding and navigation buttons for Home and Privacy Policy with active state styling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook managing ICP backend actor creation with Internet Identity authentication, returning authenticated or anonymous actor based on login state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity persistence, and AuthClient lifecycle.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file reserved for React Query hooks that interact with the backend.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS with banana-themed OKLCH color system, game environment background image with overlay, and custom banana-styled button components.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility function combining clsx and tailwind-merge for conditional Tailwind CSS class merging.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React application entry point wrapping App with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Main landing page component for Banana Split game featuring hero section with game title, jungle banner image, game description card with features (multiple maps, grabbable items, exploration), and environment showcase section.
frontend/src/pages/PrivacyPolicyPage.tsx: Privacy policy page component displaying information collection practices for Chimp Factory and BananaSplit games, including what data is collected (username, platform ID, gameplay data) and what is not collected (passwords, payment info).
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration file defining custom theme with OKLCH color system, banana/jungle themed colors, extended border radius values, custom box shadows, and container settings.
project_state.json: Project state metadata indicating this is a fix request to remove the 'Play Banana Split Now!' button from the HomePage component (feature REQ-1).
